definition: sentence/clause/phrase/classifier for phrases or lines of verse
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: Invisible things can't be destroyed. Period.
sentences.chinese: 无形的东西不会毁灭，句号。

sentences.english: Semi-colons show a pause which is longer than a comma, but not as long as a full stop.
sentences.chinese: 分号表达的是一个比逗号长句号短的停顿。

sentences.english: After the caves, all it took to complete a perfect day was a trip to the pub.
sentences.chinese: 参观洞穴之后，让泡吧来为完美的一天画上句号。

sentences.english: This will be announced to the world tomorrow, putting an end to the whole saga .
sentences.chinese: 明天整个世界将明朗，这段传奇故事划上句号。

sentences.english: All other languages support the period-separated format.
sentences.chinese: 其他所有语言都支援句号分隔的格式。

sentences.english: Putting a period for my naive, which means that I've striked forward to my maturity.
sentences.chinese: 为曾经的幼稚画上句号，此时此刻我走向了成熟。

sentences.english: Let us draw to a close this era of meta-narratives.
sentences.chinese: 让我们为“元叙事”的时代画个句号吧。

sentences.english: We were really looking forward to paying off that relationship.
sentences.chinese: 我们真的期待把这段关系可以画上句号。

sentences.english: If, in this Heavenly Stems of the farm, they are taboo.
sentences.chinese: 若在这天干了农活，就属于犯忌句号。

sentences.english: You should use two spaces after a sentence-ending period.
sentences.chinese: 应该在句尾的句号后边加上两个空格。

sentences.english: I use memories under an end to end the iron between us the story.
sentences.chinese: 我用回想烫下一个句号来竣事我们之间的故事。

sentences.english: The competitors cantered into the arena to conclude the closing ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 选手们慢跑进入竞技场，为闭幕式画上了句号。

sentences.english: But I will tell you that Kobe Byrant plays basketball better than Yao Ming.
sentences.chinese: 但俺告诉你，科比比姚明打得好句号。

sentences.english: Just see the overbrimming river flowing east!
sentences.chinese: 恰似一江春水向东流句号。

sentences.english: Much like the Period type, you like order.
sentences.chinese: 和“句号型”性格一样，你也喜欢秩序性。

sentences.english: End this amazingly full day with a full stomach at dinner.
sentences.chinese: 这精彩的一天将在您饱饱的美餐一顿后画上句号。

definition: the curtain drops/the end of the show
to wind up/to bring to an end/to finish
to come to the end of a phase (idiom)
to take a curtain call/(fig.) to come to an end
